"近衛兵": "How unfortunate. I was expecting Enga and the others to understand what I was saying."
"Your opinion is one focused on the future of the Earth. It must be difficult for those fools to understand."
"Ophiel? I won't tolerate insults towards Enga or ARKS."
"Without their cooperation, we could not have come this far. You should be appreciative."
"I should not have said that. Please forgive me."
"As long as you understand."
"Sir Ardem! An inquiry from ARKS regarding Sir Ardem's actions!"
"Claiming they wouldn't accept a refusal to reply, they gave us a hard time. Sir Ardem, just what did you...?"
"There's no need for a reply. Silence will communicate my will."
"In any case, how long has it been since you joined Earth Guide?"
"It has already been 10 years since Sir Ardem has brought me here. And I've been a guard for 3 years and 4 months."
"Ah, 10 years. Simply a moment compared to the life of a star."
"But for people, that's quite a long time. ...Thank you for serving me so well."
"I-I am unworthy of such kind words! Because of Sir Ardem's guidance, we were able to learn new strengths, new reason."
"This body, this strength, is for you!"
"For me? You're mistaken. Your strength, and my strength, are all for Earth. They exist for the evolution of Earth."
"For the evolution of Earth?"
"Yes... People on Earth must change. To give birth to new ideas and resurrect the creation of this world, and bring paradise back."
"Humanity must evolve to fit that world..."
"To someone as faulty as myself, you've served me well. Together, let us evolve into perfection."
"Wha... Ugh, ghooooo!? Siiiiir Aaaardem?!"
"It seems the vessell couldn't handle it. Evolution is quite difficult."
"What did you do?"
"By sending in Ether, I tried to embody the image of the evolution adapting to his body. Using Mother's power, of course."
"Since the evolutionary path should be correct, there's no choice but to adjust the number of test subjects and trials."
"The forced evolution of the physical body...? Sir Ardem, if you force evolution like that, it will cause issues and the vessel won't last."
"Ophiel, there are times when the vessels will survive. I know, because I've seen it over and over."
"In order for evolution to take place, there must sometimes be sacrifices. This is true of all things."
"Now, let us be on our way, Ophiel. For the rebirth of this planet."
